patthana12.10:2.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana12.10:4.1: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.10:5.1: Nooghaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… noyogaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana12.10:6.1: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.10:8.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana12.10:10.1: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
